title: dayAparan shankaran
sahitya:
dayAparan shankaran caraNamalar talai paNindaNivAi manamE


anupallavi

  vyOmakEshan kayilAsa vAsan meyyaDiyArkkaruLum jagadIshan


caraNam    dikku dishai ellAm tirindalaindAi nAnum
Shiru matiyAl unnait-toDarnd-alaindEn manamE
mikkuLLa nALEnum nAn sholvadaik-kEL bhuviyil
meeNDum pirandirandu mANDazhiyAmal
